title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.6 - Pedestrians required to keep left
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.6 - Pedestrians required to keep left

State Regulations

Pedestrians while crossing either bridge shall use the
roadway and keep to the extreme left hand side. Upon the approach of a vehicle
they are required to step up on the curb or stand close to the roadway fence
until the vehicle has passed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
654.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
